venues.name: Amangani Spa
venues.review: Amangani sits above the Snake River valley with Grand Teton views that make the $180 entry feel like a reasonable trade. The heated outdoor pool in winter is one of the defining spa experiences in the American West — you're floating in hot water while the Tetons sit across the valley in snow. There is nothing else like it.

venues.name: Spa Soleil at Snake River Lodge
venues.review: At the base of Jackson Hole Mountain Resort in Teton Village, which means you can ski to it. The rooftop hot tubs with Teton views are the move after a powder day. A more accessible entry point to Jackson Hole spa than Amangani without compromising on setting.
